stale_contracts.purpose: Governance & Verification Authority - Ensures all system outputs comply with ADR constraints, signs off on critical decisions
stale_contracts.recommendation: RETAIN - Core governance authority, static specification expected

stale_contracts.purpose: Chief Strategy Officer - Directs strategic priorities, allocates research focus, owns directional vision
stale_contracts.recommendation: RETAIN - Strategic authority, static specification expected

stale_contracts.purpose: Intelligence & Signal Processing - Hunts for alpha signals, manages signal pipelines, cognitive search
stale_contracts.recommendation: RETAIN - Core intelligence layer, static specification expected

stale_contracts.purpose: Execution Authority - Manages order routing, execution timing, broker interface
stale_contracts.recommendation: RETAIN - Core execution layer, static specification expected

stale_contracts.purpose: Chief Security & Ethics Officer - Monitors for adversarial inputs, ensures ethical constraints
stale_contracts.recommendation: RETAIN - Security baseline, static specification expected

stale_contracts.purpose: Chief External Intelligence Officer - Ingests external data (news, macro, sentiment), manages CEIO pipeline
stale_contracts.recommendation: REVIEW - Pipeline shows low activity, may need reactivation directive

stale_contracts.purpose: Chief Financial Accounting Officer - Tracks PnL, manages cost attribution, ROI calculation
stale_contracts.recommendation: RETAIN - Financial tracking baseline, static specification expected

stale_contracts.purpose: Code Implementation Agent - Writes and maintains codebase under STIG direction
stale_contracts.recommendation: RETAIN - Implementation layer, static specification expected

stale_contracts.purpose: Chief Regime Intelligence Officer - Manages regime detection, state transitions, CRIO framework
stale_contracts.recommendation: RETAIN - Active in regime calculations, minor staleness acceptable

classification_legend.FOUNDATIONAL: Core system component, specification is static by design, no deprecation warranted
classification_legend.OPERATIONAL: Active in daily operations, minor staleness is tolerable
classification_legend.DORMANT: Specification exists but limited recent activity, may need attention
classification_legend.OBSOLETE: No longer serves system purpose, candidate for deprecation

action_items.action: Review EC-009 (CEIO) dormancy - determine if reactivation directive needed
action_items.rationale: CEIO pipeline shows semantic 4D weighting failure, may indicate deeper issue

action_items.action: Consider annual contract refresh cycle for FOUNDATIONAL contracts
action_items.rationale: Ensures specifications stay current even if static

conclusion: 9 contracts identified as STALE (>30 days since update). All 9 are classified as FOUNDATIONAL or OPERATIONAL with static specifications. NO deprecation recommended. EC-009 (CEIO) flagged for dormancy review.
